title: Android 13 will disable all haptics in Silent mode
content:
Google recently dropped the first Android 13 developer preview release for its Pixel devices. We’ve already talked about some of the new features and changes coming in the next big Android upgrade in our original coverage, but Android 13 DP1 has a lot more to offer. A closer look at the build has revealed a

The post Android 13 will disable all haptics in Silent mode appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google is introducing a minor change in Android 13 that will let you disable all haptics when using your phone in Silent mode. Read on to learn more.
